posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb Sweet Cap 150 Green Portrait SGC 3
posts.post_content:
Card is SOLD.

The card has great centering with deep green color.

Only moving to diversify my PC.

$13,000 Net (last SGC 3 with similar centering and deep green color did $14500)

Glare is from my iPhone & lighting.
